organizations: AM Rod Chester National Technology Writer APPLE
title: ‘Star Wars is white genocide propaganda’
text: ‘Star Wars is white genocide propaganda’ 10:58 AM HARRY TUCKER LOADS of angry, racist Twitter users have managed to get the hashtag #BoycottStarWarsVII trending, claiming the movie is ‘anti-white’. Ridiculously easy way to earn millions 10:37 AM Harry Tucker EVERY day, a bunch of Australians do this during their free time. This guy’s figured out a way to make easy millions in the process. How to tell if your Facebook is being spied on 9:51 AM Michael Morrow THE social media giant will now alert users whenever they come under surveillance from government-sponsored links. Here’s how it works. Creating the music for Halo 5 7:40 AM Staff writers BEING a music composer for a video game is hard, but it’s nothing compared to the pressure of creating the soundtrack for one of the biggest gaming franchises. Apple bans 250 apps that spied on users 7:00 AM Rod Chester National Technology Writer APPLE has banned hundreds of apps from its App Store that have been secretly spying on iPhone users for years. Hate your telco? Try these 15:49 PM Harry Tucker WE see them everywhere. Amaysim, Boost and now Kogan Mobile. But what do you actually get with these other, cheaper telcos? And can you trust them? Captain America and Thor kiss 14:32 PM MATTHEW DUNN MARVEL has revealed Thor and Captain America will share a kiss as part of its All-New, All-Different relaunch of the Avengers. Ermahgerd girl: My life as a meme 13:16 PM Emma Reynolds MAGGIE Goldenberger didn’t expect to shoot to fame. Three years on, “Berks” has revealed the surprising truth behind the meme.
